author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Put the eggs, double cream, parmesan, salt and freshly ground black pepper together in a small saucepan, stir well and cook for two minutes over a low heat.  Place the cooked spaghetti in a small gratin dish, pour over the sauce, sprinkle with parmesan and put under the grill until bubbling. Heat a grill to high.  Place the slices of prosciutto on a baking sheet under the grill for 3 minutes until crisp. To serve, place the prosciutto on top of the gratin and drizzle with olive oil.
ingredients: 3 free-range eggs, beaten,  3 tbsp double cream,  75g/3oz parmesan, grated (1 tbsp reserved),  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  250g/9oz fresh spaghetti, cooked for 2 minutes and drained,  2 slices prosciutto,  olive oil, to drizzle
